name: Beautiful of Bromo
description: You can see beautiful sun rise from king Kong hill by jeep or tracking. And horse riding experience to bromo crater after se sun rise can make your trip more fun. And hear the story of bromo about " joko seger and roro anteng ". will make your trip at bromo complete. We call bromo " God Place" because bromo is the center of Hindu in Indonesia For kasada festival. They throw chicken, food etc to crater to respect of the god. That's tradtion of tengger people at bromo.
